name: Frenzy Match Color Candy Game
description:
Switch and match lollipop candy to solve HUNDREDS of levels in this compelling swirl lollipops puzzle adventure!! Isn't it the BEST pet linking game ever?

Rules and Features:
1, hundreds of thousands well designed levels of lollipop ingredients.
2, when sweet candies gaming,it will randomly appear some props,which are very useful.
3, pay attention to the changes of the background color of the removed dessert recipe candy.
4, when the background color of sweet cupcakes all grids of each level are transparent, then you success going to next level.
5, if any swap position can not reach the condition(3 or more the same in one line), then you lost this level.

- Swiped is a very simple to learn swipe pop lollipop action based game for all touch screen mobile devices.
- Each level is progressively challenging and very addictive.
- Challenge your skills in 5 game modes with unlimited candy lolly levels.
- Excite Magician & Witch by swiping over them along with similar coloured lollipop sticks dessert bar chains.
- Compete with thousands of players around the bakery world.
- Specially the sound in the game is very relaxing
- bounce your way through this unique puzzle game.
- fun playing yhis like a pinball game
